4:
For Windows user:
On macOS, select Export for the new aText and save data to file (with .json extension).
On Windows, click Import and choose exported file.

For macOS user:
In the new aText, just Open or Import the data file of the legacy version.
Or follow the above steps for Windows user.
5:
For Windows user:

  1. On macOS, select Export for the new aText and save data to file (with .json extension).
  2. On Windows, click Import and choose exported file.

 

For macOS user:

  • In the new aText, just Open or Import the data file of the legacy version.
  • Or follow the above steps for Windows user.
10: Import data from aText legacy for macOS
